title: As Easy as Murder - [A Primavera Blackstone Mystery, #3] - Quint
description: The third crime thriller in the Primavera Blackstone seriesA tranquil Spanish village by the sea is the perfect place for Primavera Blackstone to raise her 10-year-old Tom, son of the late lamented Oz, especially when they are joined by his nephew, pro golfer Jonny Sinclair. But when her best friend Shirley introduces her new man, Patterson Cowling, he seems to be a trouble magnet. A casual thief tries to pick his pocket and is found a few days later with his face blown off. A bloody coincidence, or does Patterson Cowling have a past to protect? As the body count rises, and Primavera becomes den mother to an extended golfing family, it seems that homicide is par for the course, and that hazards lie in wait for everyone. Can she save the day, or is the game just too rough?
